price: Wͻkaa sε: “Yεsom abosom, na yεbεkͻso de yεn ho ama wͻn”.
arabic: قَالُواْ نَعۡبُدُ أَصۡنَامٗا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَٰكِفِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū naʿbudu aṣnāman fanaẓallu lahā ʿākifīna
